_header: Had I hearts a thousand thousand score
_description: In the company of his mistress by Charles d’Orléans — three 8-line stanzas and 4-line Envoy

BLHar682.First Lines:
Hadde y hertis a thousand þouȝand scoreAlle shulde
                    þei thanke yow myn owen ladi dere…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…But wher so fortune gide me fer or nereHit besse swet hert to
                    me your pouer man
